original_text: And they ran and fetched him thence: and when he stood among the people, he was higher than any of the people from his shoulders and upward.
korean_text: 그들이 달려 가서 거기서 그를 데려오매 그가 백성 중에 서니 다른 사람보다 어깨 위만큼 컸더라

sentences.original_text: and when he stood among the people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 백성 가운데 서 있을 때

sentences.original_text: he was higher than any of the people
